name: A mixture consisting of 63-72 percent oxidized bis(hydrogenated tallow alkyl)amines, 12-15 percent bis(hydrogenated tallow alkyl)amines, 4-8 percent (hydrogenated tallow alkyl)nitrones, and 5-12 percent (hydrogenated tallow alkyl)oximes.
FoodContactSubstance: A mixture consisting of 63-72 percent oxidized bis(hydrogenated tallow alkyl)amines, 12-15 percent bis(hydrogenated tallow alkyl)amines, 4-8 percent (hydrogenated tallow alkyl)nitrones, and 5-12 percent (hydrogenated tallow alkyl)oximes.
